Package game.model

Class Game4GewinnModel

java.lang.Object
game.model.Game4GewinnModel
public class Game4GewinnModel extends Object
The game implementation of 4 Gewinn or Connect 4. This class is the model of the game. It can be either used in combination with view and controller or directly through Jshell.
Author:
Yohanes Kirana

  • Constructor Details

    • Game4GewinnModel

      public Game4GewinnModel(int width, int height)
      Creates a new game instance with the given game field size.
      Parameters:
      width - width of the game field
      height - height of the game field

  • Method Details

    • insertMove

      public boolean insertMove(int column)
      Save the move that is inserted by player into the game board. If the selected column is full, player will be asked to choose another column.
      Parameters:
      column - Column which player choose.

    • printBoard

      private void printBoard()
      Print the current condition of the board game.

    • getSlot

      public int getSlot(int n)
      Get the contents of the slot on the board.
      Parameters:
      n - Selected slot.
      Returns:
      Content of the selected slot.

    • getBoard

      public int[] getBoard()
      Get the contents of the entire board.
      Returns:
      Contents of the entire board.

    • changeTurn

      private void changeTurn()
      Change the current player's turn.

    • setPlayerTurn

      public void setPlayerTurn(int n)
      Set the player's turn.
      Parameters:
      n - Player's turn.

    • getPlayerTurn

      public int getPlayerTurn()
      Get the current turn.
      Returns:
      Current turn.

    • isWinner

      private boolean isWinner()
      Check if there is a winner. A winner is determined, if he has 4 balls in a row horizontally, vertically, or diagonally.
      Returns:
      True if a winner is determined, false otherwise.

    • isTie

      private boolean isTie()
      Check if the game end without any winner.
      Returns:
      True if there is no winner, false if the game has not end yet.

    • isGameOver

      private void isGameOver()
      Check if the game is over. This method update winner state if the game ends.

    • getWinner

      public int getWinner()
      Get The winner of the Game.
      Returns:
      Winner, -1 if the not over, 0 if there is no winner.

    • isFull

      public boolean isFull(int column)
      Check if the column is Full. the player will be asked to insert another column if it does.
      Parameters:
      column - Column that will be inserted.
      Returns:
      True if the column is full, false if the column is not full.

    • isInsideColumnRange

      private boolean isInsideColumnRange(int column)
      Check if the column inserted inside of range.
      Parameters:
      column - Column that will be inserted.
      Returns:
      True if the column is inside of range , false if the column is outside of range.

    • prepareThread

      public void prepareThread()
      Start ClientServerThreadClass without starting a thread.

    • newServer

      public void newServer(int port)
      Initialize new server and start thread for server.
      Parameters:
      port - port of server.

    • newClient

      public void newClient(String ip, int port)
      Initialize new Client and start thread for client.
      Parameters:
      ip - ip address of client.
      port - port of client that should be identical to server.

    • sendMove

      public void sendMove(int n)
      Send player's move into network.
      Parameters:
      n - move of player.

    • setConnectionError

      public void setConnectionError(boolean message)
      Set the network error notification.
      Parameters:
      message - true or false if the connection error.

    • getConnectionError

      public boolean getConnectionError()
      Get the network error notification to true so the view can draw message.
      Returns:
      true or false

    • setFalsePort

      public void setFalsePort(boolean message)
      Set the port error notification .
      Parameters:
      message - true or false if the port false.

    • getFalsePort

      public boolean getFalsePort()
      Get the port error notification to true so the view can draw message.
      Returns:
      true or false.
